author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Come and Get a Look at Selena Gomez's Photos of Her Date With Benny Blanco
text:
Summary by Ground News Selena Gomez and Benny Blanco were spotted on an artsy date. The pair were at Luna Luna: Forgotten Fantasy, an art exhibit in Los Angeles. Gomez and Blanco have been dating for about six months. They co-produced Blanco's most recent song, Single Soon. Share menu More
Filters 8 Articles 8 Articles All Left Center Right

The singer, 31, took to her Instagram Stories on Wednesday, December 27, to share several photos from the couple’s recent visit to an art exhibit. In one snap, Blanco, 35, embraced Gomez from behind as she smiled for the camera. Gomez also posted a photo of herself and a shot of Blanco looking at the artwork.
